item.title: I need help with my compiler?!?!?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @Tvs1230 Tvs1230
item.description:
@Tvs1230 wrote:

thank you frugoo i really needed help but the pub;lic void (i put the ; in by mastake)
lol thank you for the help i wasnt trying to spam but i went through and i got this after i fixed all i can im new at this and i need to read on how to fix this but im teaching myself how to make a server.
npchandler.java:270:illegal start of expression
public void monsterdropitemdintnpcid({
^

npchandler.java:270:illegal start of expression
public void monsterdropitemdintnpcid({
^

lol ive been trying for a while and cant get it if someone could help me id be happy

item.title: I need help with my compiler?!?!?!?!?!?!
item.dc:creator: @frugoo_scape frugoo scape
item.description:
@frugoo_scape wrote:

i hope did not make this for spam…
replace:
if {playerhandler.isplayeron(“Tvs1230”)){
With:
if (playerhandler.isplayeron(“Tvs1230”)){

replace :
pub;ic void monsterdropitems(int npcid) {
with:

public void monsterdropitems(int npcid) {

replace :
else{
with:
else if ( code here ) {

I hope you needed the help and just did not do this for spam. If you could not figure this out on your own, i suggest you read up on basic java programming.

Read full topic
